list.name: tag_groups
list.description: Tag groups. Each tag group shares the same tag name and have differnt custom behaviours.

group.name: tag_group
group.description: A tag group. Contains a set of army skins. Those skins can be tagged by user or randomly selected depending on its type property.

string.name: name
string.description: tag name of the tag group. Cannot be empty and must be unique.

int.name: default_random_count
int.description: Default count for randomly picked army skins if type is set to random.

enum.name: type
enum.description: Single: Only one skin can be tagged in this group. If another skin is tagged, the previous tagged skin will be untagged automatically. Mulitple: Muliple skins in this group can be tagged. Random: Randomly pick tagged skins.

string.name: spawn_point
string.description: The name of the spawn point marker in mode_showcase.scar. It is also the variable name for the unit in the "inventory_tag" Lua data store. For example a value of "vehicle" will be found at "inventory_tag.vehicle".

instance_reference.name: unit
instance_reference.description: Can be a squad (infantry, tanks, etc...) or an entity (building, capture point, etc...)

string.name: user_tag
string.description: The name of the tag when the user explicitly tags the unit. When non-empty, this choice has priority over the randomized tag.

string.name: random_tag
string.description: If there is no user_tag then get a random unit from this tag group.
